name: Blinded
shortDescription: You can't see. You automatically fail vision-based skill checks. You can't detect anything using vision. All creatures and objects are hidden from you if they're beyond your reach.

name: Broken
shortDescription: You're at half your maximum Hit Points or below. You take a status penalty equal to your broken value to all your checks and DCs.

name: Clumsy
shortDescription: Your movements become clumsy and inexact. Clumsy always includes a value. You take a status penalty equal to the condition value to Dexterity-based checks and DCs, including AC, Reflex saves, ranged attack rolls, and skill checks using Acrobatics, Stealth, and Thievery.

name: Concealed
shortDescription: While you are concealed, you're harder to see. You have a 20% chance to avoid targeted effects. You can't be flanked.

name: Confused
shortDescription: You don't have your wits about you, and you attack wildly. You are flat-footed, you don't treat anyone as your ally, and you can't Delay, Ready, or use reactions.

name: Controlled
shortDescription: Someone else is controlling your actions. You are still aware of your surroundings but can only take actions the controller allows you to take.

name: Dazzled
shortDescription: Your eyes are overstimulated. You are blinded and also take a -1 status penalty to visual Perception checks.

name: Deafened
shortDescription: You can't hear. You automatically fail sound-based and auditory checks. You can't detect anything using hearing.

name: Doomed
shortDescription: You are unnaturally close to death. Doomed always includes a value. If you gain the doomed condition while you already have it, increase the condition value by the amount specified.

name: Drained
shortDescription: Your life force has been leeched away. Drained always includes a value. You take a status penalty equal to your drained value on Constitution-based checks.

name: Dying
shortDescription: You are bleeding out or otherwise at death's door. Dying always includes a value. If you gain the dying condition while you already have it, increase the condition value by the amount specified.

name: Encumbered
shortDescription: You are carrying more weight than you can manage. While you're encumbered, you're clumsy 1 and take a 10-foot penalty to all your Speeds.

name: Enfeebled
shortDescription: You're physically weakened. Enfeebled always includes a value. You take a status penalty equal to the condition value to Strength-based rolls and DCs, including Strength-based melee attack rolls, Strength-based damage rolls, and Athletics checks.

name: Fascinated
shortDescription: You are compelled to focus your attention on something, distracting you from whatever else is going on around you. You take a -2 status penalty to Perception and skill checks, and you can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they or their intended consequences are related to the subject of your fascination.

name: Fatigued
shortDescription: You're tired and can't summon much energy. You take a -1 status penalty to AC and saving throws. You can't use exploration activities performed while traveling, such as those on page 479.

name: Frightened
shortDescription: You're gripped by fear and struggle to control your nerves. Frightened always includes a value. You take a status penalty equal to this value to all your checks and DCs. You can't willingly place yourself in situations that would make you more frightened.

name: Grabbed
shortDescription: You're held in place by another creature, giving you the flat-footed and immobilized conditions. If you're grabbed by something you're on or in, you're flat-footed but not immobilized.

name: Hidden
shortDescription: While you're hidden, you're undetected by all creatures who don't have precise sense of you. You can attempt to use Stealth to become hidden.

name: Immobilized
shortDescription: You can't use any action with the move trait. If you're immobilized by something holding you in place and you can break free, you can spend 3 actions to attempt to break free.

name: Invisible
shortDescription: While invisible, you can't be seen. You're undetected to everyone. Creatures can't know your location if you're invisible.

name: Paralyzed
shortDescription: You're frozen in place. You have the flat-footed condition and can't act except to Recall Knowledge and use other actions that require only your mind.

name: Petrified
shortDescription: You have been turned to stone. You can't act, nor can you sense anything. You become an object with a Bulk double your normal Bulk and AC 9.

name: Prone
shortDescription: You're lying on the ground. You are flat-footed and take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls. The only move actions you can use while you're prone are Crawl and Stand.

name: Quickened
shortDescription: You're able to act faster. Quickened always includes a value. You gain a number of additional actions each turn equal to the condition value. These actions can be used only to Strike or Stride.

name: Restrained
shortDescription: You're tied up and can barely move, or a creature has you in its clutches. You have the flat-footed and immobilized conditions, and you can't use any actions with the attack or manipulate traits except to attempt to Escape or Force Open.

name: Sickened
shortDescription: You feel ill. Sickened always includes a value. You take a status penalty equal to this value on all your checks and DCs. You can't willingly ingest anything.

name: Slowed
shortDescription: You have fewer actions. Slowed always includes a value. When you regain your actions at the start of your turn, reduce the number of actions you regain by your slowed value.

name: Stunned
shortDescription: You've become senseless. Stunned always includes a value. You lose your actions equal to the condition value. Stunned might also have a duration instead of a value, such as "stunned for 1 minute."

name: Stupefied
shortDescription: Your thoughts and instincts are clouded. Stupefied always includes a value. You take a status penalty equal to this value on Intelligence-, Wisdom-, and Charisma-based checks and DCs.

name: Unconscious
shortDescription: You're sleeping, or you've been knocked out. You can't act. You take a -4 status penalty to AC, Perception, and Reflex saves, and you have the blinded and flat-footed conditions.

name: Unnoticed
shortDescription: When you're unnoticed by a creature, that creature has no idea you're present at all. When you're unnoticed, you're also undetected by the creature.

name: Wounded
shortDescription: You have been seriously injured. Wounded always includes a value. If you gain the dying condition while wounded, increase your dying condition value by your wounded value.
